topic.title: Anti Spam/Troll delay mechanism feature wish
topic.body: What ZeroTalk lacks is a strong anti spam/troll mechanism, everyone should have to wait a relatively long time when they register an id and also before they can send their messages. 15 - 30 minutes would be enough. There should also be an upper limit of messages per id and a delay between them. That would certainly reduce the number of trolls since they get bored easily.
